author: Pierre

commands.description: Rename a file. Warning: use this only if necessary, it's HEAVY to run, this will delete and recreate the file with another name.
commands.name: file-management-rename-file

commands.description: Delete the attachment from the incident and from the XSOAR server.
commands.name: file-management-delete-attachment

commands.description: Copies a file from this incident to the specified incident. Usefull if you want to manipule file in the preprocessing.
commands.name: file-management-upload-file-to-incident

commands.description: Delete the file from the incident and from the XSOAR server.
commands.name: file-management-delete-file

integration.description: This integration uses the XSOAR API to perform basic but essentials actions on files.
integration.name: XSOAR File Management (Community Contribution)

description: This pack let user manipulate file inside XSOAR more easily than with the builtin functions.
name: XSOAR File Management
